text:
Originally reported by: **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**

---

There are a lot of places in the project where the nodes are created using the old format. We should try to update them to use the new format instead.

---
- Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/logilab/astroid/issue/191
title: [easy] Change node constructors in the project to use the new format
